Reviews.Title: “A great Stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Joni M
Reviews.Content: daughter started italy vacation rome impressed hotel comfortable quiet night bathroom fabulous loved variety breakfast convenient hotel sites thanks wonderful stay rome definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Short Stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Knockabout
Reviews.Content: honestly booked hotel ok price accommodation cheap pleasantly surprised lovely bathroom everthing ate dinner flooor clean bathroom sparkled staff couldnt downside breakfast whist served 1000 am 930 re stock fridges lucky breakfasts typical contental style stayed 4 nights honestly rome stay hotel location perfect 10 minute walk termini station trains metros colliseum minutes termini note bus termini airport costs 4 euros

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Price for Rome!”
Reviews.Author: Grace L
Reviews.Content: husband returned week trip italy stayed verona hotel night amalfi coast nights wrote review hotel sorrento city returned rome 4 nights 2nd leg trip celebrate type travelers stay locations service clean stay feel getting value verona hotel delivered criteria dont stay seasons getting affordable prices paying trust researching lodging rome expensive holiday prices agree reviews forum bathrooms thats europe importantly clean clean towels elevator 4 floors luggage breakfast included nice typical continental breakfast cappuccino morning toast deli meats cheeses yogurt juices location 10 minute walk rome central station rome termini 4 nights bought roma pass 30 euros metro pass 3 days skip line benefits admissions colosseum metro vatican city maurizio front desk espcially helpful limited italian limited english able figure game plan sight seeing consider staying hotel verona

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Alena37
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel verona nights staff extremely nice spoke english clean recently updated balcony spite central location quiet facing backyard breakfast italian standards offered cheese ham rolls juices coffee cereal baked location convenient close major attractions termini overall extremely satisfied rome

Reviews.Title: “Clean, reasonably priced, comfortable and in decent location”

Reviews.Content: partner rome weekend leading easter didnt plan happened limited times needless crowded time hotels expensive werent available little worried hotel little closer train station 6 blocks guidebooks read avoid immediately train station nice crime neighborhood hotel fine corner santa maria church bit traffic street hotel 13 block street excessively noisy windows windows closed temperature adjusted colosseum 15 minute walk attractions walkable distances bedroom bathroom fancy clean comfortable retreat tired days found staff front desk helpful spoke english spoke italian stay especially considering price reasonable compared hotels rome looked comfortable overall stayed italy didnt noise mosquito temperature ran star ratings

Reviews.Title: “Rude hotel mgmt”
Reviews.Author: Edward M
Reviews.Content: am 70 yrs traveling europe united hotel male desk person rude daughter speaks italian study italy yrs ago wife daughters staying hotel daughter unloaded car luggage brought lobby daughter proceeded desk person help wluggage curtly busy looked else lobby phone calls reading newspaper bathrooms parking car yes street brought car garage 2 blocks day picked car told e25 hotel told hotels stayed verona stars vacation hotels stayed opposite verona hotel beautiful accomodating staff please hotel verona bck hotels 101

Reviews.Content: stayed six days hotel chosen location features bathrooms reception staff helpful night manager located popular tourist attractions public transport local tour companies restaurant door live music hear lower floor breakfast indoor alfresco dining pleasent breakfast ok hot

Reviews.Content: 2 week stay family owned hotel pleased attitude staff accommodations breakfast wholesome hotel quiet except near elevator location central attractions close onoff buses front desk helpful flexible wish payment arrival protect themselves daily payment compromise clean size varied unique

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location”

Reviews.Content: adequate hotel purposes sightseeing holiday conveniently located trains buses walking distance sights eg coliseum forum trevi fountain clean bathroom clean unlike mentioned reviews 302 breakfast plenty eat

Reviews.Content: hotel pretty location nice staff affordable happy leave hotel stay decent tiny washroom gross shower water collected bathroom floor probably supposed stay corner shower shower didnt drain properly entire floor covered soap dirty water difficult washroom showering disgusting breakfast cleaned visitors arrived towards breakfast hours tables covered garbage lacking cutlery breakfast appetizing check time hotel 1000am communicated checking previous experiences rome hotels check time aways noon okay hotel stay else time im rome

Reviews.Title: “Yes the Colosseum is only 10 minutes walk away.”

Reviews.Content: easy 510 minute stroll main termini railway station 1015 minute walk colosseum clean comfortable smallish bathroom permanent peculiar odour lots eating options close walkable distance trevi fountain pantheon piazza navona particularly wrong verona special alternatives close probably worth considering aircon lifts tv breakfast wifi wasn’t free

Reviews.Content: hotel nice block half metro lots restaurants street street choose free breakfast morning hot foods filling 2 blocks hop hop bus tour friendly staff rome definately stay
